subject: World Cup 2010 (Soccer)
World Cup (Soccer)
Soccer
Officiating (Sports)
lead_paragraph: This final had no taunting or head-butting like the last one, and did not end with the gloomy coup de grâce of penalty kicks.
snippet: This final had no taunting or head-butting like the last one, and did not end with the gloomy coup de grâce of penalty kicks.
